title: Debuting Mayonez
content:
Dear typophiles,

I'd like to debut my last typeface called Mayonez, a serifed family that attempts to balance seriousness and friendliness. This type was thought for headings and big applications. I hope you like it.

Take a closer view at [Behance](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414212128/http:/www.behance.net/gallery/Mayonez/12663083) or purchase it on [MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414212128/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sardiez/mayonez/) and save 50% until January 5, 2014.

Best wishes,  
Sergio Ramírez

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414212128im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typo_poster_4649.jpg)
author: sardiez

comments.content: Nick, Thomas, 5star, Nick... Thank you very much!
